title: Epica - Discography (2002-2009) [FLAC]
description:
Genre: Symphonic Power/Gothic Metal
Origin: Netherlands  (Reuver, Limburg) 

Albums:

2009-Design Your Universe

Yves Huts - Bass (2003-) (Gurthang (Bel), Axamenta, Ecliptica (Bel))
